content:
[Note the urgency of the postdoctoral positions mentioned below!]

The University of Western Ontario is hiring, and I'd like to encourage people on this list to apply for positions. Western is a great place to be mathematically (and otherwise), with lots of activity in homotopy theory, category theory, and other closely related areas.

The list of all positions is at

https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs?joblist-167

but I'll highlight two ads here:

We expect to hire one or more postdoctoral researchers, and the review of these begins on December 5, 2023. Late applications will still be considered, but please apply as soon as possible to ensure that your application is considered:

https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs?joblist-167-23315

We also have a Teaching Scholar position, which is intended to be an ongoing position, with a "probationary period" (analogous to being tenure-track) followed by "continuing status" if promoted to Associate Professor. The deadline is January 15:

https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs?joblist-167-23609

People from all areas of math are eligible for both positions. Western is located in London, Ontario, Canada.

Feel free to contact me with any questions.
